info.author: Peter Bouda
info.description: PyAnnotation is a Python Library to access and manipulate linguistically annotated corpus files. Supported file format is currently only Elan XML, with Kura XML and Toolbox files support planned for future releases. A Corpus Reader API is provided to support statistical analysis within the Natural Language Toolkit.
info.name: pyannotation
info.html_description: PyAnnotation is a Python Library to access and manipulate linguistically annotated corpus files. Supported file format is currently only Elan XML, with Kura XML and Toolbox files support planned for future releases. A Corpus Reader API is provided to support statistical analysis within the Natural Language Toolkit.
